root: ^I have to thank you, grandpa. You gave me a new perspective on my life I didn’t know I needed.
^I have to thank you for that grandpa, you always did look out for me.
^You made me realise I can’t keep running away like I have.
^I need to actually do something about it all, to find the next step in my journey to heal from the past.
^Maybe Rebecca can help me find my next step, just like grandpa and grandma always did for each other.
